attributes.action: Make Parliament scrap two old laws before introducing any new one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the last ten years, Parlament has introduced about 4,000 new ways for us to fall foul of the law.
There are far too many outdated laws, rules and regulations for a free country.
Let's scrap two for each new one introduced, we won't miss them!
